20101221013226.000|20101221013228.000|CC1|>> Reporter: 1.9%.              
20101221013228.000|20101221013230.000|CC1|THAT'S THE MEASLY AVERAGE       
20101221013230.000|20101221013231.000|CC1|DIVIDEND THAT S&P 500 FIRMS ARE 
20101221013231.000|20101221013237.000|CC1|PAYING OUT THESE DAYS.          
20101221013237.000|20101221013238.000|CC1|THE GOOD NEWS IS THE PAYOUTS ARE
20101221013238.000|20101221013239.000|CC1|EXPECTED TO BECOME MORE GENEROUS
20101221013239.000|20101221013239.000|CC1|NEXT YEAR.

20101221013240.000|20101221013240.000|CC1|THAT'S BECAUSE MANY COMPANIES   
20101221013240.000|20101221013254.000|CC1|ARE BECOMING MORE OPTIMISTIC.   
20101221013254.000|20101221013255.000|CC1|>> Reporter: DIVIDENDS ARE A    
20101221013255.000|20101221013255.000|CC1|CASH FLOW ITEM, AND YOU NEED TO 
20101221013255.000|20101221013256.000|CC1|HAVE HIGH CONFIDENCE BEFORE YOU 
20101221013256.000|20101221013257.000|CC1|COMMIT TO SENDING OUT THAT      
20101221013257.000|20101221013257.000|CC1|CHECK.                          
20101221013257.000|20101221013258.000|CC1|IT'S ALSO BECAUSE SO MANY FIRMS 
20101221013258.000|20101221013258.000|CC1|ARE SITTING ON BUCKETS OF CASH. 
20101221013258.000|20101221013259.000|CC1|SURE, SOME WILL USE THAT MONEY

20101221013305.000|20101221013307.000|CC1|FIRMS INCREASING PAYOUTS.

20101221013618.000|20101221013619.000|CC1|US ABOUT?

20101221013631.000|20101221013631.000|CC1|BETTER THAN THE INDEX FUND.

20101221013658.000|20101221013701.000|CC1|INVESTING IN COMPANIES THAT     
20101221013701.000|20101221013703.000|CC1|HAVE BEEN REALLY OUT OF

20101221013715.000|20101221013716.000|CC1|DIVIDEND YIELD OF THE THREE.

20101221013721.000|20101221013723.000|CC1|LOOKING TO FILL OUT LET'S       
20101221013723.000|20101221013724.000|CC1|SAY THE VALUE PORTION OF        
20101221013724.000|20101221013725.000|CC1|THEIR PORTFOLIO.                
20101221013725.000|20101221013727.000|CC1|>> REAL QUICKLY WE HAVE A       
20101221013727.000|20101221013728.000|CC1|FEW SECONDS LEFT.               
20101221013728.000|20101221013729.000|CC1|ANY ADVICE TO INVESTORS.        
20101221013729.000|20101221013730.000|CC1|THEY MIGHT THINK THAT YOU       
20101221013730.000|20101221013731.000|CC1|GET INTO A STOCK FUND THAT      
20101221013731.000|20101221013733.000|CC1|PAYS DIVIDENDS, THEY ARE        
20101221013733.000|20101221013734.000|CC1|GOING TO GET A LOT OF           
20101221013734.000|20101221013734.000|CC1|INCOME.                         
20101221013734.000|20101221013736.000|CC1|ANY WARNINGS?                   
20101221013736.000|20101221013738.000|CC1|>> YEAH, NOT NECESSARILY.       
20101221013738.000|20101221013739.000|CC1|BUT I THINK THAT INVESTORS      
20101221013739.000|20101221013742.000|CC1|SHOULD NECESSARILY-- INCOME.    
20101221013742.000|20101221013743.000|CC1|SOMETIMES COMPANIES THAT PAY    
20101221013743.000|20101221013745.000|CC1|A LOT OF INCOME AREN'T GREAT    
20101221013745.000|20101221013746.000|CC1|COMPANIES.                      
20101221013746.000|20101221013746.000|CC1|INVESTORS DON'T LIKE THEM       
20101221013746.000|20101221013748.000|CC1|FOR A REASON AND SO YOU

20101221013750.000|20101221013751.000|CC1|SOMETHING THAT'S GOING TO       
20101221013751.000|20101221013752.000|CC1|EVENTUALLY RUN INTO TROUBLE.

20101221013754.000|20101221013756.000|CC1|THAT ARE RUN BY EXPERIENCED

20101221014354.000|20101221014355.000|CC1|>> AND HERE YOU ARE TEACHING

20101221014415.000|20101221014417.000|CC1|WHO NEED THEM HERE.             
20101221014417.000|20101221014418.000|CC1|>> WE WANT THOSE KINDS OF       
20101221014418.000|20101221014419.000|CC1|CONNECTIONS TO OCCUR.           
20101221014419.000|20101221014423.000|CC1|WE CAN'T, AS A UNIVERSITY, BRING
20101221014423.000|20101221014425.000|CC1|THINGS TO THE PUBLIC GOOD IN    
20101221014425.000|20101221014426.000|CC1|TERMS OF PRODUCTS.              
20101221014426.000|20101221014428.000|CC1|WE CAN DEVELOP IDEAS THAT OTHERS
20101221014428.000|20101221014434.000|CC1|CAN WORK ON TO DEVELOP FURTHER. 
20101221014434.000|20101221014435.000|CC1|WHAT WE DON'T WANT TO DO IS USE 
20101221014435.000|20101221014437.000|CC1|OUR NAME AND REPUTATION TO SERVE
20101221014437.000|20101221014439.000|CC1|AS THE MARKETING FOR INDUSTRY.  
20101221014439.000|20101221014441.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT CRITICS OF DRUG
20101221014441.000|20101221014443.000|CC1|COMPANY PRACTICES SAY MEDICAL   
20101221014443.000|20101221014445.000|CC1|SCHOOLS THAT WANT TO PROTECT

20101221015318.000|20101221015321.000|CC1|CLOTHES AND PAJAMAS, AND SOME   
20101221015321.000|20101221015322.000|CC1|TOYS-- YOU KNOW, SOMETHING FUN. 
20101221015322.000|20101221015323.000|CC1|>> Reporter: EVERY CHRISTMAS,   
20101221015323.000|20101221015324.000|CC1|THE CHICAGO POST OFFICE INVITES 
20101221015324.000|20101221015325.000|CC1|THE PUBLIC TO RESPOND TO        
20101221015325.000|20101221015327.000|CC1|THOUSANDS OF LETTERS TO SANTA   
20101221015327.000|20101221015330.000|CC1|FROM NEEDY KIDS.                
20101221015330.000|20101221015331.000|CC1|BUT THIS YEAR, MANY OF THE      
20101221015331.000|20101221015332.000|CC1|LETTERS ARE FROM ADULTS WHO'VE  
20101221015332.000|20101221015335.000|CC1|LOST JOBS AND ARE SEEKING HELP  
20101221015335.000|20101221015336.000|CC1|FOR THEIR CHILDREN.             
20101221015336.000|20101221015337.000|CC1|MAUREEN SHANAHAN AND HER MOM    
20101221015337.000|20101221015340.000|CC1|PICKED OUT ONE SUCH LETTER.     
20101221015340.000|20101221015340.000|CC1|>> MARIO IS DEVELOPMENTALLY     
20101221015340.000|20101221015341.000|CC1|DELAYED.                        
20101221015341.000|20101221015341.000|CC1|THE SITUATION HAS MADE THINGS   
20101221015341.000|20101221015343.000|CC1|HARD.                           
20101221015343.000|20101221015345.000|CC1|I'VE BEEN UNABLE TO WORK.       
20101221015345.000|20101221015346.000|CC1|>> WE THOUGHT WE WOULD COME OVER
20101221015346.000|20101221015348.000|CC1|AND GET A LETTER AND SEE WHAT WE
20101221015348.000|20101221015348.000|CC1|COULD DO TO MAKE SOMEONE'S      
20101221015348.000|20101221015349.000|CC1|CHRISTMAS REALLY GREAT.         
20101221015349.000|20101221015350.000|CC1|>> Reporter: POST OFFICE        
20101221015350.000|20101221015351.000|CC1|SPOKESMAN MARK REYNOLDS SAYS    
20101221015351.000|20101221015352.000|CC1|MANY LETTERS REQUEST BASICS LIKE
20101221015352.000|20101221015354.000|CC1|FOOD, CLOTHING AND MAYBE AN     
20101221015354.000|20101221015357.000|CC1|INEXPENSIVE TOY.                
20101221015357.000|20101221015359.000|CC1|>> THEY'RE NOT THE KIDS ASKING  
20101221015359.000|20101221015401.000|CC1|"HEY, SANTA I WANT AN XBOX."    
20101221015401.000|20101221015402.000|CC1|THEY'RE MOMS AND DADS ASKING    
20101221015402.000|20101221015403.000|CC1|"HEY, SANTA, CAN YOU GET MY KIDS
20101221015403.000|20101221015404.000|CC1|SOMETHING FOR CHRISTMAS, BECAUSE
20101221015404.000|20101221015405.000|CC1|THEY'VE BEEN REALLY GOOD, BUT I 
20101221015405.000|20101221015411.000|CC1|CAN'T AFFORD IT."               
20101221015411.000|20101221015412.000|CC1|>> Reporter: PLAYING SANTA      
20101221015412.000|20101221015412.000|CC1|REQUIRES BOXING UP THE GIFTS... 
20101221015412.000|20101221015413.000|CC1|GETTING THEM WEIGHED FOR THE    
20101221015413.000|20101221015415.000|CC1|PROPER POSTAGE...               
20101221015415.000|20101221015415.000|CC1|THEN CARTING THEM BACK TO       
20101221015415.000|20101221015417.000|CC1|ANOTHER AREA THAT HANDLES THE   
20101221015417.000|20101221015419.000|CC1|GIFTS.                          
20101221015419.000|20101221015420.000|CC1|FOR JORGE BIDLES, WHO'S THE     
20101221015420.000|20101221015421.000|CC1|FATHER OF TWO, IT'S WORTH THE   
20101221015421.000|20101221015423.000|CC1|EFFORT.                         
20101221015423.000|20101221015424.000|CC1|>> THIS IS MY FIRST TIME, AND   
20101221015424.000|20101221015425.000|CC1|I'M GOING TO KEEP DOING IT EVERY
20101221015425.000|20101221015426.000|CC1|YEAR.                           
20101221015426.000|20101221015427.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BY THE END OF THIS 
20101221015427.000|20101221015429.000|CC1|WEEK, OPERATION SANTA COULD     
20101221015429.000|20101221015430.000|CC1|SPREAD A LITTLE HOLIDAY CHEER TO
20101221015430.000|20101221015432.000|CC1|NEARLY 11,000 CHICAGO FAMILIES. 
20101221015432.000|20101221015433.000|CC1|DIANE EASTABROOK, "NIGHTLY      
20101221015433.000|20101221015437.000|CC1|BUSINESS REPORT," CHICAGO.
